member.summary: Base FTP exception class.

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Common.FTPOperationCancelledException
member.summary: Exception indicating that a command or set of commands have been cancelled by the caller, via a callback method or event.

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Common.FTPCommandException
member.summary: FTP exception generated by a command with a return code >= 400, as stated in RFC 959.

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Common.FTPSslException
member.summary: FTP exception related to the SSL/TLS support

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Common.DirectoryListParser
member.summary: Based on Adarsh's code: http://blogs.msdn.com/adarshk/archive/2004/09/15/230177.aspx

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Common.SslInfo
member.summary: Encapsulates the SSL/TLS algorithms connection information.

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode
member.summary: The SSL/TLS support requested or required for a connection.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.ClearText
member.summary: No SSL/TLS support. Used for standard FTP connections.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.CredentialsRequested
member.summary: Requests a SSL/TLS connection during authentication. Authentication is performed using if SSL/TLS is not supported by the server. Reverts to after authetication if the CCC command is supported by the server.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.CredentialsRequired
member.summary: Requires a SSL/TLS connection during authentication. Reverts to after authetication if the CCC command is supported by the server.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.ControlChannelRequested
member.summary: Requests a SSL/TLS connection on the control channel.
member.remarks: Acts like but does not revert to after authentication.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.ControlChannelRequired
member.summary: Requires a SSL/TLS connection on the control channel.
member.remarks: Acts like but does not revert to after authentication.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.DataChannelRequested
member.summary: Requests a SSL/TLS connection on the data channel, implies . Data transfers are not encrypted is not supported by the server.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.DataChannelRequired
member.summary: Requires a SSL/TLS connection on the data channel, implies .

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.ControlAndDataChannelsRequested
member.summary: Requests a SSL/TLS connection on both control and data channels, implies and . Control channel commands and data transfers are not encrypted is not supported by the server.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.ControlAndDataChannelsRequired
member.summary: Requires a SSL/TLS connection on both control and data channels, implies and .

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.All
member.summary: An alias for

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode.Implicit
member.summary: Implicit SSL/TLS, not supported by RFC 4217. Both control channel and data channel are always encrypted.

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ETransferActions
member.summary: Possible actions occurring during a file transfer.

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.EPatternStyle
member.summary: File pattern style used in and .

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.EPatternStyle.Verbatim
member.summary: Interpret as is.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.EPatternStyle.Wildcard
member.summary: Interpret as wildcard, where * means 0 or more chars having any value and ? means one char having any value.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.EPatternStyle.Regex
member.summary: Interpret as a regular expression.

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.EDataConnectionMode
member.summary: Trasfer mode used in connections

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FileTransferCallback
member.summary: Callback used during file transfers to notify the caller about any command progress.
member.param: null if not available (e.g. the server does not support the SIZE command).

member.name: T:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient
member.summary:
Class used to connect to an FTP/FTPS server. The main goal of this class is to provide a complete and easy to use FTP client connection, implementing SSL/TLS extension and providing tested compatibility to the main FTP server products.
Implemented RFCs: 959, 2228, 2389, 2428, 2640, 3659, 4217.
Not all commands described in the above RFCs are implemented at the current stage.
member.remarks: Requirements: MS Framework 2.0 and above or Mono 2.0 and above.

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.useCtrlEndPointAddressForData
member.summary: true to ignore the address returned by PASV

member.name: F:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.sslMinKeyExchangeAlgStrength
member.summary: 0 means no check

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Anonymous authentication
member.returns: The text of the \"welcome message\" sent by the server.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.Connect(System.String,AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.ESSLSupportMode)
member.summary: Anonymous authentication
member.returns: The text of the \"welcome message\" sent by the server.

member.summary: Connects to a FTP server using the provided parameters. The default representation tipe is set to Binary. The text encoding is set to UTF8, if supported by the server via the FEAT command.
member.param: Connection timeout in ms. null can be specifiad to keep the default value of 120s.
member.returns: The text of the \"welcome message\" sent by the server.

member.summary: Connects to a FTP server using the provided parameters. The default representation tipe is set to Binary. The text encoding is set to UTF8, if supported by the server via the FEAT command.
member.param: Connection timeout in ms. null can be specifiad to keep the default value of 120s.
true to use the control channel remote address for data connections instead of the address returned by PASV
member.returns: The text of the \"welcome message\" sent by the server.

member.summary: Connects to a FTP server using the provided parameters. The default representation tipe is set to Binary. The text encoding is set to UTF8, if supported by the server via the FEAT command.
member.param: Connection timeout in ms. null can be specifiad to keep the default value of 120s.
true to use the control channel remote address for data connections instead of the address returned by PASV
Active or Passive data connection mode
member.returns: The text of the \"welcome message\" sent by the server.

member.summary: Set the representation type according to the given parameter

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFeatures
member.summary: Features returned from the FEAT command
member.returns: null if the FEAT command is not supported by the server

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFileTransferSize(System.String)
member.summary: Remote transfer file size returned by the SIZE command.
member.returns: The file transmission size in bytes, based on the current transfer mode or null if the SIZE command is not supported.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFile(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the given file from the server. A is returned, to be read until the end of file. See the overload to easily save the stream to a local file.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: GetFile overload to easily transfer a file from remote to local

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFile(System.String,System.String,AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FileTransferCallback)
member.summary: GetFile overload to easily transfer a file from remote to local

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFiles(System.String,System.String,System.String,AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.EPatternStyle,System.Boolean,AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FileTransferCallback)
member.summary: Transfers all files, matching the given pattern, from the given remote directory. Optionally recursive
member.param: Absolute or relative remote path, null indicates the current directory
May be null to transfer all files

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFiles(System.String,System.String,AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.EPatternStyle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transfers all files, matching the given pattern, from the current remote directory. Optionally recursive

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFiles(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transfers all files from the current remote directory. Optionally recursive

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Transfers all files from the current remote directory without recursion

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.PutFile(System.String)
member.summary: Stores a remote file, returning a to be used for writing the file contents. Call on the stream once done. See the overload to easily transfer the contents of a local file.

member.summary: PutFile overload to easily transfer a file from local to remote

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.PutFile(System.String,System.String,AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FileTransferCallback)
member.summary: PutFile overload to easily transfer a file from local to remote

member.summary: Transfers all files, matching the given pattern, to the current remote directory. Optionally recursive

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.PutFiles(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transfers all files to the current remote directory. Optionally recursive

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.PutFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Transfers all files to the current remote directory without recursion

member.summary: AppendFile overload to easily transfer a file from local to remote

member.summary: AppendFile overload to easily transfer a file from local to remote

member.summary: PutUniqueFile overload to easily transfer a file from local to remote

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.PutUniqueFile(System.String,System.String@,AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FileTransferCallback)
member.summary: PutUniqueFile overload to easily transfer a file from local to remote.

member.summary: Deletes the given remote file.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.RenameFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Renames the given remote file.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.MakeDir(System.String)
member.summary: Creates the given remote directory.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.RemoveDir(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given remote directory.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.ChangeToUpperDir
member.summary: Changes the remote directory to the parent directory.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetShortDirectoryList(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an array of file names and directories contained in the given directory. Please use or for more detailed directory information.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetDirectoryList(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of the contents form the given directory. A parsing is performed on the data returned fronm the LIST command.
member.remarks: Please use or in case of parsing errors, as the contents returned from FTP servers may differ from the common DOS and UNIX formats adopted here.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetDirectoryListUnparsed(System.String)
member.summary: returns the given directory list data as returned from the server, without parsing its contents.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.PushCurrentDirectory
member.summary: Pushes the current remote directory on a stack, in order to easily restore it later calling .

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.PopCurrentDirectory
member.summary: Restores the current directory. For details please see . Throws an exception if the stack is empty.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.SetCurrentDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the remote current directory.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetSystem
member.summary: Returns some remote system information, as returned from the SYST command.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.GetFileModificationTime(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the modification time of the given remote file or null if the MDTM feature is not supported by the server.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.SetLanguage(System.String)
member.summary: Set the language used by the server during the current connection. Please check the features returned by for a list of available languages supported by the server.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.SetTextEncoding(AlexPilotti.FTPS.Common.ETextEncoding)
member.summary: Set the given text encoding.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.SendCustomCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Sends the given FTP command text to the server.
member.remarks: In case of return codes >= 400 an exception is thrown.

member.summary: Closes the current connection, freeing resources.

member.summary: Copies the protocol information form the given stream.

member.name: M:AlexPilotti.FTPS.Client.FTPSClient.CheckSymLinks(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{AlexPilotti.FTPS.Common.DirectoryListItem})
member.summary: Workaround needed because it is not possible to determine if a symlink is a directory or a file based on the UNIX style directory listing.
